verifiedContactID.title: Verified Contact record ID
verifiedContactID.description: Stores the contact record ID to be updated.

newCity.title: New City
newCity.description: Stores the value of the new city provided by the customer. If no change is desired, this variable is empty.

newEmailAddress.title: New Email Address
newEmailAddress.description: Stores the value of the new email address provided by the customer. If no change is desired, this variable is empty.

newPhoneNumber.title: New Phone Number
newPhoneNumber.description: Stores the value of the new phone number provided by the customer. If no change is desired, this variable is empty.

newPostalCode.title: New Postal Code
newPostalCode.description: Stores the value of the new postal code provided by the customer. If no change is desired, this variable is empty.

newState.title: New State
newState.description: Stores the value of the new state provided by the customer. If no change is desired, this variable is empty.

newStreetAddress.title: New Street Address
newStreetAddress.description: Stores the value of the new street address provided by the customer. If no change is desired, this variable is empty.
